column1: This image is usually showed as a big image on product page.
column2: This image is usually showed as a big image on product page.

column1: Default Magento quality is 90. You could setup this to 99 or even 100.
column2: Default Magento quality is 90. You could setup this to 99 or even 100.

column1: You may disable sharpen totally with this setting.
column2: You may disable sharpen totally with this setting.

column1:
This value affect the image sharpen or bluring.
0-3: blur
4-20: sharpen. (Best is 8-15).
more 20: seems no visual effect.
By default is set to 8.
column2:
This value affect the image sharpen or bluring.
0-3: blur
4-20: sharpen. (Best is 8-15).
more 20: seems no visual effect.
By default is set to 8.

column1: This image is usually showed in product grid on category pages.
column2: This image is usually showed in product grid on category pages.

column1: This image is usually showed below big image on product page.
column2: This image is usually showed below big image on product page.

column1: This type of images used when you create additional Media Image attribute and show them in your template.
